admin-port.description: Admin port. Provides an administrative UI for this instance.

config-filename.description: URI of namerd config file, appends to config-uri. See https://linkerd.io for config docs.

config-uri.description: URI of namerd config file, prepends to config-filename.

cpus.description: CPU shares to allocate to each namerd instance.

http-port.description: httpController port. Provides a REST interface to add/update dtabs.

mem.description: Memory (MB) to allocate to each namerd task.

resource-role.description: The accepted resource roles (e.g. slave_public). By default, this will deploy to any agents with the * role.

thrift-port.description: thriftNameInterpreter port. namerd serves name data to linkerd on this port.
